content: Set the default storage quota for rooms in this {{productName}}. It can later be adjusted for each room individually by the room admin.

comment.text: "This translation key controls the default storage quota setting displayed to users when adjusting room quotas. It can later be adjusted individually by room admins. Appears in the 'QuotaPerRoom' category."

usage.context:
<StyledBaseQuotaComponent>
 <MobileCategoryWrapper
 title={t("QuotaPerRoom")}
 onClickLink={onClickLink}
 url="portal-settings/management/disk-space/quota-per-room"
 subtitle={t("SetDefaultRoomQuota", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 isDisabled={isDisabled}
 />
 <MobileCategoryWrapper

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "الحصة النسبية" (al-hassa al-nisbiyya) translates to 'relative quota' which doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'storage quota.' A more accurate translation would be something like 'سعة التخزين' (sa'at al-takhzeen).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتعيين سعة التخزين الافتراضية للغرف في {{productName}} هذا. (Qum bi-ta'yeen sa'at al-takhzeen al-iftiradiya lil-ghuraf fi {{productName}} hatha.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'هذا' (hatha) which means 'this' is somewhat awkward in this context. It's unnecessary and makes the sentence a bit clumsy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتعيين سعة التخزين الافتراضية للغرف في {{productName}}. (Qum bi-ta'yeen sa'at al-takhzeen al-iftiradiya lil-ghuraf fi {{productName}}.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'default' is transliterated as 'defolt'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu {{productName}}-də otaqlar üçün *default* yaddaş kvotasını təyin edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'prostor' (space) doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'productName' in this context. It's too generic. It should reflect the specific product or platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more precise term that reflects the product name, such as 'systému' (system) or something tailored to the specific product. For example, 'Nastavení výchozí kvóty úložiště pro místnosti v tomto systému {{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tämän {{productName}}-n huoneille' sounds awkward in Finnish. It's unnecessarily possessive and a more natural phrasing would be 'tässä {{productName}}-tilassa' or 'tässä {{productName}}-palvelussa' (depending on what 'productName' represents). 'Huoneille' is technically correct, but not ideal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta oletustallennuskiintiö tähän {{productName}}-tilaan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pääkäyttäjä' (main user) isn't the most accurate translation of 'room admin'. 'Huoneen ylläpitäjä' or 'Huoneen hallinnoija' would be better translations, implying administrative control.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Huoneen ylläpitäjä voi myöhemmin muokata sitä jokaisen huoneen osalta erikseen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "configurer les quotas de stockage spécifiquement pour chaque salle" is a bit clunky. A more natural translation for "adjusted for each room individually" would be something like "modifier les quotas de stockage pour chaque salle".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Définissez les quotas de stockage par défaut pour les salles {{productName}}. L'administrateur de salle peut modifier les quotas de stockage pour chaque salle plus tard.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon after 'չափաբաժինը' which isn't consistent with the English style. In the English content, there is no colon after 'quota'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after 'չափաբաժինը'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ストレージ容量制限' (storage capacity limit) is technically correct, but 'ストレージクォータ' (storage quota) would be a more direct and natural translation of 'storage quota'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この{{productName}}ルームのデフォルトのストレージクォータを設定してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using a more natural phrasing like '各ルームごとにルーム管理者によって個別に調整可能です' would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この{{productName}}ルームのデフォルトのストレージクォータを設定してください。容量制限は後でルーム管理者によって各ルームごとに個別に調整可能です。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Administrator de sală" is not the most natural translation for "room admin." It's too literal and formal. A more idiomatic translation would be "administratorul sălii" or simply "administratorul".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: administratorul sălii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "poate configura cote de stocare mai târziu individual pentru fiecare sală" is a bit clunky. A more fluent translation would be "poate ajusta mai târziu cotele de stocare pentru fiecare sală individual" or "poate modifica ulterior cotele de stocare pentru fiecare sală".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: poate ajusta mai târziu cotele de stocare pentru fiecare sală individual

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ආචයන සලාකය' (aachayana salaakaya) is an unusual and potentially inaccurate translation for 'storage quota'. It doesn't convey the intended meaning clearly. 'භාරකිරීම් සීමාව' (bhaarakarim simevaa) or 'ගබඩාවේ සීමාව' (gabadaavae simevaa) would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම {{productName}} හි කාමර සඳහා පෙරනිමි භාරකිරීම් සීමාව සකසන්න. or මෙම {{productName}} හි කාමර සඳහා පෙරනිමි ගබඩාවේ සීමාව සකසන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation maintains the English variable {{productName}}. While technically correct, it's generally better to either translate the variable or remove it if the product name will be inserted separately in the Sinhala version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating the variable or ensuring it's handled appropriately in the Sinhala implementation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'priestore' (space) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'in this {{productName}}'. It's a bit too generic. It should reflect the specific product or platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte predvolenú kvótu úložiska pre miestnosti v tomto {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'administrátor miestnosti' is somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing for 'room admin' in Slovak would be 'správca miestnosti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte predvolenú kvótu úložiska pre miestnosti v tomto {{productName}}. Neskôr ju môže pre každú miestnosť individuálne upraviť správca miestnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "v tem prostoru" is awkward and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'in this {{productName}}'. It seems to be translating 'in' as 'in the space' instead of 'within this product/system'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavite privzeto kvoto prostora za shranjevanje v tem {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The final "sobe." is unnecessary and grammatically incorrect. It's a repetition of the preceding noun.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the trailing "sobe."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'подразумевану' (podrazumevanu) which translates to 'implied' or 'assumed' doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'default' in this context. 'Default' implies a pre-set value, not necessarily one that is implied or assumed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите подразумевану или унутрашњу складишну квоту за собе у овом {{productName}}-у. (Postavite podrazumevanu ili unutrasnju skladishnu kvotu za sobe u ovom {{productName}}-u.) - Uses 'унутрашњу' which translates to 'internal' and is closer to default in meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the genitive suffix '-у' on 'productName' seems unnecessarily informal. While acceptable in conversational Serbian, a more formal register is preferable for a setting description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Поставите подразумевану складишну квоту за собе у овом {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "postavite" is an imperative form and doesn't fit the context of a setting description. It implies the user is being instructed to do something. A more appropriate phrasing would be a descriptive term like 'Odredite' (Set) or 'Podesite' (Adjust).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odredite podrazumevanu skladišnu kvotu za sobe u ovom {{productName}}-u.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of hyphenation with "-u" at the end of 'productName' might be incorrect depending on the specific Serbian grammatical rules. It may require further context to confirm.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider whether the hyphenation is necessary or if it's more appropriate to omit it based on the specific naming convention.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “admina sobe” is a slightly awkward phrasing. A more natural Serbian equivalent would be 'administrator sobe' or simply 'admin'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odredite podrazumevanu skladišnu kvotu za sobe u ovom {{productName}}-u. Kasnije može biti podešeno za svaku sobu individualno od strane administratora sobe ili admina.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "просторі" (prostori) translates more to 'space' rather than the intended meaning of 'product' or 'platform'. It's unclear and might confuse the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Установіть квоту сховища за замовчуванням для кімнат у цьому продукті {{productName}}. (Use 'продукті' for product)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "адміністратор кожної кімнати зможе налаштувати квоту окремо для своєї кімнати" is a bit wordy.  It can be simplified without losing meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Адміністратор кожної кімнати зможе пізніше налаштувати квоту окремо. (Administrator of each room can adjust the quota later.)
